meanings: (술·약·열기 등에) be[get] drunk, (formal) be[get] intoxicated, (formal) become inebriated, (약간) (informal) get tipsy
(도취하다) be drunk on[with], (formal) be enraptured, (literary) get intoxicated
reel under the influence of liquor

vlive.korean: 똑같은 포즈 한번 취해봐요 - 뭐야? 어떻게 한 거야? Do the same pose. - What? What did I do? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: Do the same pose. - What? What did I do?

vlive.korean: [맞아... 근데 난 24/7 취해있어서 그런 말 안 해] 안 취했다고 하잖아요! 뭔지 알죠? [Right... but I'm drunk 24/7 so I don't say that] say they are not drunk. You know? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [CIX] ~호로로록 쭈와아아압 막내즈의 우당탕탕 무국물 마시기~ (JINYOUNG&HYUNSUK drinking chicken radish soup)
vlive.english: [Right... but I'm drunk 24/7 so I don't say that] say they are not drunk. You know?

vlive.korean: 한 잔 먹으면 취해? Do you get drunk when you drink a glass of wine? 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) TOURLOG EP.23
vlive.english: Do you get drunk when you drink a glass of wine?

vlive.korean: [사진놀이 하는 구사즈] 포즈 한번 취해 주세요 찰칵! [94 line playing around] Pose. Click! 듣기 View video Red Velvet : ReVe Festival FINALE EP. 2
[취해있는데요 도공 중독 매일 도공한테 취해있느라 숙취도 없잖아요] 예쓰! [I'm always wallowing in how amazing they are] Yes! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [DAY6] 괜찮아~ 데망진창과 함께라면 다 fine 해 그냥‼️ (DAY6 talking about their tour)
vlive.english: [I'm always wallowing in how amazing they are] Yes!

examples.korean: The guests left in an alcoholic haze. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 손님들은 술에 취해 몽롱한 상태로 떠났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The guests left in an alcoholic haze. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They were arrested for being drunk and disorderly. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 술에 취해 난동을 부려 체포되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were arrested for being drunk and disorderly. Add to Wordbook

examples.english: Police arrested him for being drunk and disorderly. Add to Wordbook
